DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 2139 yr . 2 . Basal FSH < 12mIU/ml 3 . Anterior mullerian hormone ( AMH ) > 1.0 ng/ML 4 . Antral follicle count ( AFC ) > 8 5 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 35 mt2/kg 6 . Estradiol ( E2 ) < 50PG/ML 1 . Women one ovary . 2 . Women ovaries see ultrasonography . 3 . Women small uterine cavity . 4 . Women history recurrent pregnancy loss 5 . Women systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) , Nephrotic syndrome , Meyer Rocky Tansky Kustner Hammer ( MRKH ) syndrome , etc . 6 . Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) I II positive woman .
